commit message: Stuff.
Added instrumentation logging option.
New dna binary with instrumentation logging mode & more battery monitoring.
DNA and Asterisk now run without root. Asterisk binaries use correct linker natively.  Some convenience scripts added (reinstall and p).
Added wifi restart on sleep to work around no broadcast RX while sleeping problem.  Minimum API level now 7.
Further fixes for maintaining wifi function when phone sleeps.
Resolved duplicated code between adhoc{Start,Stop,Restart}
Reimported features from Raiders Of The Lost Source (gateway, hlr import/export)
Add instrumentation thread
Rearrange power off detection into the status notification thread, force the mesh to stop on install (also forces su prompt)
Added more from Raiders Of The Lost Source (gateway mode)
Simplify how the broadcast receiver is registered
Automatically migrate display of toasts to the main UI thread
Fix test for asterisk running after forced close
Don't restart adhoc during a sip call
Move peer list to its own activity, update peer information live
Wait 15 seconds before restarting
Don't release wake lock when restarting
Reduce log spam from resolving phone numbers
Use java dna client to quickly set phone number
Start/Stop access point from settings
Add simple web server with link to apk's
Proper fix to allow receipt of broadcast packets on broadcom chipsets
Updated DNA binary (gateway mode and other fixes)

Enabling instrumentation collects as well as sends instrumentation data.
Stores it in /sdcard/
Add separate setting for logging instrumentation
cleanup
Add latency and dropped packet info to peer list
Create new subscriber if dna has forgotten
Give dna time to flush to disk, should be automatic though
cleaner way of detecting the main ui thread
Allow sendparallel to stop on first reponse or all responses
Force re-install if our apk modified time has changed
Link all installed apk's into the web server
Auto launch application after reinstall
Hopefully improves phone ui lockups
Activate incall screen from notification
Tweak how we wait for adhoc to start
Use a single su script
fix ip address comparison
Encapsulate and improve control of personal AP mode
Connector for websms
fix, notification should not start if adhoc failed to start
Initial work on proper gateway support with direct tie-in to Asterisk.
Add sticky broadcast for primary number changes
Improve WifiAp control
Add sid to SET_PRIMARY intent
Added config options and tweaked asterisk config file in preparation for easy-to-use Serval DNA Gateway operation.
Added note about how to enquire of Asterisk SIP registration status.
Put check for asterisk gateway up before doing hard work.
Added better debug output for gateway acquisition process.
DNA Outbound gateway working in batphone. Inbound incomplete (infinite loop).
Outbound gateway now works with batphone on android with asterisk hooks.

Thomas' DT receiving DNA binary added.
Other unrelated work towards gateways working by Paul.
Thomas' modifications to recieve DT SMS and escalate to Java via an intent.
Minor fixes to get Thomas' DT reception and intent broadcasting working.
Update .gitignore to ignore object files
DNA binary updated to version with DT reception AND gateway integration.
Add find hlr check, fix compile errors

First version
